item.title: R-Downloads around the world
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 3.1 Total R Downloads 3.2 Total R Downloads per capita 3.3 Times of the year with most downloads 4 Linear regression - why use it? 5 Results 6 What does it mean? 1 Summary To see the code used in this post, visit my kernel on kaggle in R Markdown format. Write up 2 Question What countries download R the most?
